special_abilities.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest).
descriptions: On his turn, Othelstan can take one additional action.

special_abilities.name: Tiamat's Blessing of Retribution.
descriptions: When Othelstan takes damage that reduces him to 0 hit points, he immediately regains 20 hit points. If he has 20 hit points or fewer at the end of his next turn, he dies.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Othelstan attacks twice with his flail or spear, or makes two ranged attacks with his spears.

actions.name: Flail.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spear.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
